pr_title: HDDS-4231. Background Service blocks on task results.

timeline.bodyText: Usually long is not enough to contain NANOSECONDS but this variable seems just a service timeout, which should be a very small number so it should be fine.
timeline.author: amaliujia

replies.bodyText: I think we are ok with long even for nanoseconds. long can support a value of ~292 years denoted as nanoseconds.
replies.author: lokeshj1703
